attributes.action: UK fishing waters not to be used in any negotiations with the EU.
attributes.background: Our fishing industry has been decimated by EU fisheries policy discarding thousands of tons of perfectley good fish because of ridiculous EU quotas.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "UK fishing waters not to be used in any negotiations with the EU". 

You may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/204098

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
